header.title: appmon

erlref.modulesummary: A graphical node and application process tree viewer.

warning.p: The Appmon application has been superseded by the Observer application. Appmon will be removed in R16.

description.p: The application monitor Appmon is a graphical utility used to supervise applications executing either locally or on remote nodes. The process tree of an application can furthermore be monitored.
